ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if(result.match(/Just a moment/)){
cookie.removeCookie(source.bookSourceUrl)
var x=java.get("url");
var s=java.startBrowserAwait(x,"验证").body();
result=s;
	}else{
		result=result;
		}
	result;
</js>

bookSourceName: 侠客小说网（修复正文乱序）
header: { "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/102.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var arr_id = java.getElements('#txt@dd')
var arr_data_id =  java.getStringList('#txt@dd@data-id')
var len = arr_id.length
var arr = ''
for(let i=0; i<len; i++) {
for(let j=0; j<arr_data_id.length; j++) {

if(i.toString() == arr_data_id[j].toString()){

arr+=arr_id[j]
}
}}
arr
</js>

jsLib: function method(result){ const { java, source, cookie } = this ;result=result.replace(/模擬/g,'模拟');return java.t2s(result)}

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.intro: 🕰 更新时间： {{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}} 📜  内容简介： {{@@.navtxt > p.0@html##.*观看小说.}}##(^|[。！？……；]+[”」）】]?)##$1
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##^\d+\.}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
##.本章完.|【.*分享.*运营.*】|第.*章.*|.*第.*章.*|.*69吧书69新
@js:result
	.replace(/模擬/g,'模拟')
	.replace(/泡麵/g,'泡面')
	.replace(/伱/g,'你')
	.replace(/歷史/g,'历史')
	.replace(/着名/g,'著名')
	.replace(/名着/g,'名著')
	.replace(/着作/g,'著作')
	.replace(/先進/g,'先进')
	.replace(/状態/g,'状态')
	.replace(/號/g,'号')
	.replace(/縈/g,'萦')
	.replace(/[『「]/g,'“')
	.replace(/[』」]/g,'”')
	.replace(/。.*[❻６➅𝟨6Ϭ𝟔𝟼𝟞₆].*[９❾➈𝟫9(9s)९𝟡𝟿𝟗₉].*」/g,'。”')
	.replace(/。.*[❻６➅𝟨6Ϭ𝟔𝟼𝟞₆].*[９❾➈𝟫9(9s)९𝟡𝟿𝟗₉].*/g,'。')
		.replace(/新.*[❻６⑥➅𝟨6Ϭ𝟔𝟼𝟞₆].*[９❾⑨➈𝟫9(9s)९𝟡𝟿𝟗₉].*书吧.*/g,'')
